item.title: Rss Alpha
item.description: RSS is essential. This site now has an alpha-version of an RSS feed generated by an open-source Python script called genRSS.
item.author: Brian Bennett

item.title: What Is It
item.description: Pico is an experiment, mostly. Running flat-file or no-database blogs isn't as hard as it used to be, but they can still take up significant server resources.
item.author: Brian Bennett

item.title: What Can It Do
item.description: Pico is mean to be ultra-lightweight. Coming in around 10KB total, it's bare bones writing and publishing.
item.author: Brian Bennett

item.title: To Do
item.description: This is an ultra-beta version. Several things work, most features you'd expect from a publishing platform are not included at this point.
item.author: Brian Bennett

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is a post written for pico, a tiny Python blogging platform.
item.author: Brian Bennett
